title: Spotify: All The Ways to View Your Spotify Wrapped Slideshow

steps.title: Spotify Wrapped is released in late November or early December.
steps.content: Spotify Wrapped is released in late November or early December. Initially, Spotify Wrapped was released a few days into December, but it has been coming out earlier and earlier each year. After October 31st, keep an eye on Spotify's X account for information about Wrapped. In 2024, Spotify Wrapped released on December 4th.

steps.title: Mobile
steps.content: Mobile Tap the banner at the top of the mobile app. When your Spotify Wrapped for the year is available to view, you should see a banner notification at the top of your mobile app. Tap it, and you'll be able to see your Wrapped. Find it in the top menu bar. If you don't see a banner for your Spotify Wrapped, scroll through the top menu (that says All , Music , etc.)

steps.title: Website
steps.content: Website Click the announcement on the Spotify website. If you sign into https://www.spotify.com , you should see an announcement that your Spotify Wrapped is available for viewing. Click Check it out to view your Wrapped. Go to the Spotify Wrapped webpage. You can skip directly to the Spotify Wrapped webpage by going to https://www.spotify.com/us/wrapped/ , but you must be signed in to Spotify on the web to see your slideshow. Currently, you can't view your Spotify Wrapped slideshow on the desktop app. However, this may change in future years as Spotify continues to improve the Spotify Wrapped feature.

steps.title: No, you can't watch old Spotify Wrapped slideshows.
steps.content: No, you can't watch old Spotify Wrapped slideshows. You can, however, see old Spotify Wrapped playlists of your top songs from a given year. [1] X Research source To do this, type "Your Top Songs" into the Spotify search bar on the mobile app, desktop app, or website. You can add a year if you want to find a specific year's playlist, or you can leave the year off to view all of your Spotify Wrapped playlists. Fun fact: your Spotify Wrapped playlist is ordered from the songs you listened to most to the songs you listened to the least! [2] X Research source
